dict.acceptation: 显然地；表面上；似乎；显而易见；

sent.orig: But those days are apparently apparently. Thethe.
sent.trans: 但现在看来这些日子已经变为过眼烟云。

sent.orig: Apparently, this player is out of practice.
sent.trans: 显然，这名运动员疏于练习。

sent.orig: No, apparently, have been a lot of problems in that department for some time now.
sent.trans: 不，事实上有好一段时间，他们的部门一直有很多问题。

sent.orig: Apparently It'should always be do or die.
A youth shows a hand apparently daubed with blood during demonstrations in Tehran on Monday.
sent.trans: 星期一，一位年轻人出示了显然是在德黑兰示威中染上鲜血的手。
